rows.label: qst650109_msg0001
rows.name: I have a question for you, T-elos Re:.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0002
rows.name:
You're strong, but don't you think
you'd be even stronger if you
fought together with everyone?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0003
rows.name: I am coordinating, at the very least.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0004
rows.name: That's true, but...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0005
rows.name: What is your complaint?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0006
rows.name:
Battle is harsh, so of course
you have to be strict.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0007
rows.name:
But outside of that, I want to
laugh and have fun with everyone,
just like the others.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0008
rows.name:
I feel like Drivers and
Blades should support each
other, no matter what...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0009
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0010
rows.name: I understand your way of thinking, Rex.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0011
rows.name: But it is not necessary for me...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0012
rows.name: Oh, really?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0013
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0014
rows.name:
However, I will consider
implementing it somewhere, someday.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0015
rows.name:
Thanks, T-elos Re:.
That's enough for now.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0016
rows.name: Hey, can I ask you something?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0017
rows.name:
You're strong, but don't you think
you'd be even stronger if you
fought together with everyone?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0018
rows.name: I am coordinating, at the very least.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0019
rows.name: That's true, but...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0020
rows.name: What is your complaint?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0021
rows.name:
I understand the need to be
serious in battle, like you are.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0022
rows.name:
But when there's no fighting, I
think it would be nice to get
along and have fun with everyone.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0023
rows.name:
I feel like Drivers and
Blades should support each
other, no matter what...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0024
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0025
rows.name: I understand your way of thinking, Nia.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0026
rows.name: But it is not necessary for me...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0027
rows.name: I thought you'd say that...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0028
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0029
rows.name:
However, I will consider
implementing it somewhere, someday.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0030
rows.name: You'll consider it? Thanks, T-elos Re:!

rows.label: qst650109_msg0031
rows.name: I have a question for you, T-elos Re:.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0032
rows.name:
You are certainly strong. However, don't
you think cooperating with everyone
would yield a more favorable result?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0033
rows.name: I am coordinating, at the very least.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0034
rows.name: That may be, but...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0035
rows.name: What is your complaint?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0036
rows.name:
I believe it is important to be
serious in battle, as you are.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0037
rows.name:
But traveling with Rex and the
others, I've learned once again...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0038
rows.name:
that it's important for Drivers and
Blades to trust and support each other,
not just in battle, but at all times.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0039
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0040
rows.name:
I understand your way
of thinking, Meleph.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0041
rows.name: But it is not necessary for me...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0042
rows.name:
Then you do not "understand"
well enough, T-elos Re:.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0043
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0044
rows.name:
I will consider implementing
it somewhere, someday...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0045
rows.name: Thank you. That is sufficient for now.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0046
rows.name:
I've got a question
for you, T-elos Re:.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0047
rows.name:
You're strong, no doubt... but
don't you think you could try
fighting more cooperatively with us?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0048
rows.name: I am coordinating, at the very least.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0049
rows.name: Yeah, but...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0050
rows.name: What is your complaint?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0051
rows.name:
It might be natural for a Blade
to protect their Driver.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0052
rows.name:
But you're our friend,
T-elos Re:. It's not just
about defeating enemies...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0053
rows.name:
Shouldn't Drivers and Blades
live a life of mutual trust?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0054
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0055
rows.name:
I understand your way
of thinking, Zeke.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0056
rows.name: But it is not necessary for me...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0057
rows.name: I thought you'd say that...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0058
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0059
rows.name:
However, I will consider
implementing it somewhere, someday.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0060
rows.name:
Thanks, T-elos Re:. I'm
glad you understand.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0101
rows.name:
T-elos Re:, I cannot overlook
your reckless actions.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0102
rows.name: You're one to talk, KOS-MOS Re:...!

rows.label: qst650109_msg0103
rows.name:
I act with efficiency. You,
T-elos Re:, are too playful.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0104
rows.name: And you stomp on people too much.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0105
rows.name: It seems we truly are incompatible.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0106
rows.name: I agree.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0107
rows.name:
However, our objectives
should be the same.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0108
rows.name: ...Unfortunately, that is correct.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0109
rows.name:
Then, if such a situation
arises again, let us
cooperate to resolve it.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0110
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0111
rows.name:
See, T-elos Re: and KOS-MOS Re:,
you two get along so well.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0112
rows.name: I do not think so...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0113
rows.name: Yes, neither do I.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0114
rows.name: See?

rows.label: qst650109_msg0117
rows.name:
You two are good friends,
T-elos Re: and KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0118
rows.name: I do not think so...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0119
rows.name: Yes, neither do I.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0120
rows.name:
See? You're on the same wavelength,
and you're so similar.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0123
rows.name:
You and KOS-MOS Re: get along
surprisingly well, T-elos Re:.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0124
rows.name: I do not think so...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0125
rows.name: Yes, neither do I.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0126
rows.name: You're in perfect sync.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0129
rows.name:
You two seem to have fun together,
T-elos Re: and KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0130
rows.name: I do not think so...

rows.label: qst650109_msg0131
rows.name: Yes, neither do I.

rows.label: qst650109_msg0132
rows.name: See? Perfect harmony.
